Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Devin
Reviews.Content: This phone is great for what we need it for.  It has a nice large display.  great wifi connectivity and smooth interface.  Great for someone Not looking for the latest and greatest, or fastest phone but wants something stylish.  It looks like the s4 mini with same quality finish.  Just be aware the phone looks nice but isn't the most powerful underneath.  It can be slow, the camera isn't that good either and has weak flash.  For my 13 yr old daughter it works great.  For me, not so much....  I have a real S4.  The phone is great for what it is and especially for $65, as long as you keep your expectations in line with a phone in that price range You cant go wrong!

Reviews.Title: save your money
Reviews.Author: carol obear
Reviews.Content: This phone is a piece of crap.  Does not work like it should.  Camera quality is terrible.  Only good thing is the speakers work well.

Reviews.Title: Read below if you have questions ask me
Reviews.Author: Beautifullj
Reviews.Content: I didn't like this phone I thought it looked like a nice phone it is but it's more for someone who doesn't get on the internet and it doesn't have slide text and the wifi on it doesn't work. I would get this for a first phone for a teenager.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: This phone stopped working after 3 weeks. I would not recommend anyone purchase this phone. Its not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: nabin nepal
Reviews.Content: This is great smart phone. This phone works good and for this prize. I bought it for my friend as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: I purchased the phone to replace a broken phone that i had. Although this phone didnt quite work out for me iw as able to return it and received my full refund.

Reviews.Title: frist smartphone
Reviews.Author: Dave L.
Reviews.Content: hey great job love it the reason why i brought the phone cuase i going from verizon to t mobil and this is my first smartphone
